예문: The cake has a round shape.
A triangle is a shape with three sides.
예문 뜻: 삼각형은 세 변을 가지고 있는 모양이야.

예문: Squares, circles, and triangles are all shapes.
The ring has the shape of a circle.
There wasn’t a cloud in the sky.
I like to swim in the sea, not in a pool.
예문 뜻: 나는 수영장이 아니라, 바다에서 수영하는 것을 좋아해.

예문: Children swam and played in the waves.
Fish live in the sea, and tigers live on land.
예문 뜻: 물고기는 바다에 살고, 호랑이는 육지에 살아.
